title: Community Mental Health Launch
content: We hosted our first wellness awareness campaign in Arusha, reaching over 200 community members. The event focused on mental health education and provided resources for local support.
author: Dr. Simon Pierre

title: New Partnership with Local Pharmacists
content: Exciting news! We've partnered with Namnyaki Daniel and Clara Bernard Mushi to expand our health services. This collaboration will bring expert pharmaceutical advice to our community programs.
author: Heritage to Health Team
